issue.title: [Python] --exclude is not available in older git versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1889](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1889). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The workaround implemented yesterday for the version determination uses Git's `--exclude` option which is only available on very recent versions of Git. Instead we should use a `--match` expression that only matches the non-JS tags.
